column1: While it won’t affect the outcome of the election every vote in every state in every election MUST COUNT. We can’t afford the erosion of faith in our electoral system due to errors like these. Fifty states managing 150000000+ ballots is no easy task but there’s no excuse. https://t.co/GXVFckzoAA

With so many taking credit for “delivering” the presidency to Joe Biden here’s some well-deserved sunlight on Chaska Carver County and #MN03. To all who organized activated and worked so hard to return decency to the White House - THANK YOU!🇺🇸  https://t.co/jIxs5EcdfK

Hundreds of Americans with an array of political perspectives work hard every day to ensure our election was secure from meddling and interference. They deserve our gratitude. 🇺🇸 https://t.co/hEiQII2izx

Listen to State Representative Dr. Alice Mann’s remarks about covid-19 and then encourage everyone you know to do everything they can to mitigate the spread. We’re America. We unite to protect one another. And we must do so. https://t.co/kz4F4aOcJR
Bravo. https://t.co/9XscxworIe
@carrieannetc Yes. In fact 4 of the 6 House Republicans who’ve done so are members of the @ProbSolveCaucus. https://t.co/JqqOScVCat
How can so many of our leaders care so deeply about defending America from foreign adversaries but care so little about defending us from covid-19 and the undermining of our democratic institutions?

My friend @RepRiggleman lost a primary in part because he officiated a same sex wedding. And he’s among just a few Rs to aggressively condemn QAnon and issue congrats to @JoeBiden & @KamalaHarris. Too few in Congress place principle over party but Denver is one of ‘em. 🇺🇸 https://t.co/FsaxQCq9Cy

The Secretary of State serves our nation not a president or party. Such dangerous dismantling of the pillars of our democratic republic from the man who is ostensibly supposed to be its foremost advocate is shameful and another stain on the United States of America. https://t.co/h5aeabqvlf
❤️ https://t.co/hpvpHlHzJV

Enough of the debate on cable news and the twittersphere about who “delivered” the election for Joe Biden.  Fact is millions of volunteers phone bankers organizers postcard writers and contributors around the nation worked their tails off.   But VOTERS delivered it. #truth
Poignant words from an #MN03 statesman. https://t.co/w0xhAkU5Ph
LBJ is dancing like we’re feeling! 💃🏻❤️🇺🇸 #ChooseOptimism https://t.co/d4cX6xgRWH
Decency has been returned to the presidency by the American people. 🇺🇸

@hardak1973 From one Phillips to another HAPPY BIRTHDAY! 🎂
@PTAnderson_MN Thinking of you Paul. Our community mourns his loss and celebrates his legacy.

Jim Ramstad who represented #MN03 in Congress with principle and grace for almost 20 years has passed away. His legacy is a blessing to our community our state and our country. May his memory be for a blessing and I share my love and condolences with Kathryn and family. https://t.co/nbmScyNl8r

No foreign adversary has done as much damage to American democracy and faith in government as the President is single-handily doing on live television right now. To all in positions of influence please condemn this dangerous and baseless assault on our electoral system.
@JoeNeguse Voters in #MN03 join me in sending our congratulations but we’re not conceding quite yet!
Every state counts ballots after Election Day and this year will be no different. https://t.co/W0rpGQNE8g

I’m humbled to return to Congress representing the community and state that raised me. Whether I earned your vote or not I will keep my door heart and mind open - and invite America to unite around the same new spirit. We must choose decency and #EveyonesInvited! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/PyzHQ2IIy1

As long as you’re in line at your polling location by 8:00pm your vote WILL be counted. Only 80 minutes to go and you can still find your polling place here: https://t.co/pcqiW9NcRc. Let’s do this! 🇺🇸 #EveryonesInvited

I ❤️ #MN03! It’s #ElectionDay and there’s still time to vote if you haven’t already done so. Optimism vs fear calm vs chaos and decency vs division are on the ballot so please visit https://t.co/pcqiW9NcRc to make your plan. Our best days are ahead and #EveryonesInvited!🇺🇸 https://t.co/L7HdMfHOiU
https://t.co/joRQYTcf4w

The #DeanTeam is a family of diverse people and political perspectives united by a belief in truth justice decency and optimism. It’s an honor to represent the community that raised me and I humbly ask for your vote today. Let’s do this!#EveryonesInvited!☀️🇺🇸 https://t.co/HkvtObokw5

America: “We are not enemies but friends. We must not be enemies. Though passion may have strained it must not break our bonds of affection. The mystic chords of memory will swell when again touched as surely they will be by the better angels of our nature” -Abraham Lincoln🇺🇸

Take it from @DenisMcDonough @CoachPhill and me - curling is hard but voting is easy! Visit https://t.co/pcqiW9NcRc to learn how you can still cast your ballot today or tomorrow. Be a voter and #ChooseOptimism! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/0pLtG5XJAv

I love my job representing the very community in which I was raised. Even during difficult days #MN03 leads with optimism. In what universe is it patriotic for a political party to file lawsuits in multiple states to prevent Americans’ votes from counting? That’s not greatness. That’s not strength. That’s moral bankruptcy. Get out and vote America ‘cause there are people working hard to stop you.🇺🇸 https://t.co/st2L6XNCsI

Just two days before we choose decency over division optimism over fear and conversation over chaos. Halloween can be scary 🎃 - but politics shouldn’t. There’s a better way to campaign and it begins with choosing decency over division optimism over fear and conversation over chaos. #EveryonesInvited! https://t.co/6rPk9z1SsA https://t.co/4Rg7g14dGO https://t.co/LF9eEfBQVF

Just three days until the most consequential election of our lifetimes! The path to decency competency and possibility runs through #MN03. Your voice matters so please use it by making a plan to vote at: https://t.co/5KNOIrNAlB https://t.co/LqEipb8Fto

The #MN03 Thank You Tour took us to Maple Grove today where voters are ready to #ChooseOptimism. Thanks to Sen. @amyklobuchar @westlinSD34 @KristinBahnerMN and @RainesFor34A for being candidates we can all believe in! #EveryonesInvited https://t.co/IsAf257hQY

FOUR DAYS until the election! You deserve honest competent empathetic leaders who believe American democracy is strongest when everyone has a seat at the table. So please pull up a chair! 🪑🇺🇸 Return your ballot and #ChooseOptimism at https://t.co/5KNOIrNAlB https://t.co/CFpBRwrRGE

The disenfranchisement of voters is not a hallmark of greatness. It’s a sign of weakness - a symptom of a disease for which the only cure  is exercising the most precious of American blessings; the right to vote. Our legacy begins on Tuesday. All hands on deck. #ChooseOptimism🇺🇸

Special interests have corrupted our politics and it’s going to take all of us working together to fix it. That's why I'm reaching across the aisle developing bipartisan solutions to reform our government and return power where it belongs - with YOU! #EveryonesInvited https://t.co/xH5A21aYFV
The weather will never be as sunny without Dave Dahl - who I've been watching since....middle school @thauserkstp !😎 https://t.co/Gh64l6d6zR

My dear friends @piper4mn & @Morrison4MN and I grew-up together in the community we love. Our families taught us to value the Minnesota Way of truth decency justice civic engagement and opportunity for all. I can’t wait to be represented by both of them! #ChooseOptimism 🇺🇸 https://t.co/WDFgpNSWBc

Five days to convert optimism into action to vote to volunteer and to demonstrate #MN03 values. Let’s lead the way together choose optimism over fear decency over discord and conversation over chaos. Make a plan to vote at https://t.co/5KNOIrNAlB and #EveryonesInvited! https://t.co/MmHrQcXDcu

Optimism is just one piece of the puzzle. Converting it to action is how the #DeanTeam shares hopefulness in our neighborhoods our state and across America. Join us at https://t.co/EwwPIsx7xb. #EveryonesInvited! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/u1DZQSm1Wf
